2024-03-01
Prism.languages.aql = { 'comment': /\/\/.*|\/\*[\s\S]*?\*\//, 'property': { pattern: /([{,]\s*)(?:(?!\d)\w+|(["'´`])(?:(?!\2)[^\\\r\n]|\\.)*\2)(?=\s*:)/, lookbehind: true, greedy: true }, 'string': { pattern: /(["'])(?:(?!\1)[^\\\r\n]|\\.)*\1/, greedy: true }, 'identifier': { pattern: /([´`])(?:(?!\1)[^\\\r\n]|\\.)*\1/, greedy: true }, 'variable': /@@?\w+/, 'keyword': [ { pattern: /(\bWITH\s+)COUNT(?=\s+INTO\b)/i, lookbehind: true }, /\b(?:AGGREGATE|ALL|AND|ANY|ASC|COLLECT|DESC|DISTINCT|FILTER|FOR|GRAPH|IN|INBOUND|INSERT|INTO|K_PATHS|K_SHORTEST_PATHS|LET|LIKE|LIMIT|NONE|NOT|NULL|OR|OUTBOUND|REMOVE|REPLACE|RETURN|SHORTEST_PATH|SORT|UPDATE|UPSERT|WINDOW|WITH)\b/i, // pseudo keywords get a lookbehind to avoid false positives { pattern: /(^|[^\w.[])(?:KEEP|PRUNE|SEARCH|TO)\b/i, lookbehind: true }, { pattern: /(^|[^\w.[])(?:CURRENT|NEW|OLD)\b/, lookbehind: true }, { pattern: /\bOPTIONS(?=\s*\{)/i } ], 'function': /\b(?!\d)\w+(?=\s*\()/, 'boolean': /\b(?:false|true)\b/i, 'range': { pattern: /\.\./, alias: 'operator' }, 'number': [ /\b0b[01]+/i, /\b0x[0-9a-f]+/i, /(?:\B\.\d+|\b(?:0|[1-9]\d*)(?:\.\d+)?)(?:e[+-]?\d+)?/i ], 'operator': /\*{2,}|[=!]~|[!=<>]=?|&&|\|\||[-+*/%]/, 'punctuation': /::|[?.:,;()[\]{}]/ };
